name: Ellie Pig
description:
Fullscreen mode recommended. Time to take revenge on that pesky human!

You must destroy all of the owner's furniture before he locks you up in a cage. Be quick, because the owner is already gathering materials to build a cage!

-Credits-

Font: Oleander Cakes, https://www.dafont.com/oleander-cakes.font

Music to Delight Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
